title: More than a movie: Jamaica bobsleigh legend Chris Stokes on legacy of 'Cool Runnings'
description: Nelson 'Chris' Stokes was one of the original members of the 'Cool Runnings' Jamaica bobsleigh team who captured the world's imagination at Calgary 1988. Now, it's his mission to make his country genuine top 10 contenders in the world.
